Trade/Device Name(s): Estrogen Receptor Clone 6F11 Ready-to-Use Primary Antibody for Bond
Estrogen Receptor Clone 6F11 Liquid Concentrate Primary Antibody, Novocastra
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Leica Biosystems Bond III automated slide staining system
Methodologies: Qualitative antigen detection by light microscopy
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Estrogen Receptor Clone 6F11 antibodies for IHC detection of ER in breast cancer tissues using Leica Bond platforms
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative identification of estrogen receptor antigen in formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded breast cancer tissue sections by immunohistochemistry, as an aid in the management, prognosis, and prediction of therapy outcome of breast cancer.
